short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the A11y score of sites when searching in google.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ha11y allows users to discover whether or not a website will be accessible to them before even opening the website. Ha11yGoogle Chrome Extension scores and displays the accessibility score of websites directly in a google search for users with disabilities. Users can select their disability when first signing up and the results will be tailored to them, otherwise, there is also a default score for general accessibility.
